alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL DELAWARE... NORTHWESTERN SULLIVAN AND NORTHEASTERN WAYNE COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hortonville, or 14 miles west of Liberty, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockland, Damascus, Callicoon, Cochecton, Fremont, Jeffersonville, Parksville, Stalker, Hazel, and Rutledgedale. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 92 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania.
